tossup_question: 7) EARTH AND SPACE  The Mohorovicic discontinuity is between what two layers of the earth
bonus_question: 7) EARTH AND SPACE  Which of the following is not a correct statement about the earth’s interior
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) The Gutenberg Discontinuity occurs between the Outer Core and Mantle
X) The mantle is mainly comprised of liquid rock material.
Y) The presence of an Iron rich core of the earth is due to differentiation.
Z)  Mantle Convection is the driving force behind tectonic plates.
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) The mantle is mainly comprised of liquid rock material.
